tool_description:
Convert all world currencies and get the same prices As Google Finance using our Secure JSON API

Unlimited Requests
name: Currency Conveter API - Unlimited Reqests
title: Currency Conveter API - Unlimited Reqests

api_list.name: Get all cryptocurrencies supported short name with the full name
api_list.description: Fetch a list of supported crypto currencies.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-conveter-api-unlimited-reqests.p.rapidapi.com/crypto/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-conveter-api-unlimited-reqests.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fetch all available cryptocurrencies rates (From one to all)
api_list.description: Fetch all available Crypto Currencies rates from Physical or Cryptocurrencies.

api_list.name: Get all currencies supported short name with the full name

api_list.name: Fetch all available Physical Currency rates (From one to all)
api_list.description: Fetch all available Physical Currencies rates from Physical or Cryptocurrencies.

api_list.name: Fetch a single currency rate
api_list.description:
Fetch a single currency exchange rate, from and to any supported physical or digital currency.

For example, you can use it to fetch from **GBP** to **USD**.

api_list.name: Fetch multi currency rate
api_list.description:
Fetch multi currency exchange rate, from and to any supported physical or digital currency.

For example, you can use it to fetch from GBP to **USD**, **EUR** and **AUD** with one request...

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description:
Target multi currencies symbol (physical or digital or mix).
Example: GBP,EUR,AUD

api_list.name: Currency Converter
api_list.description:
Convert an amount of one currency into another currency (supports physical and digital currencies).

For example, you can use it to convert **10 GBP** to **AUD**

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: Target multi currencies symbol (physical or digital).

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: Amount of source currency to convert.
